post:
Hi Folks,

Happy to present the first offer in a while.

All offers listed below are XEN PV and come with 15GB offsite backup space (FTP+RSYNC) on request.

NL Servers in Snelserver
USA Servers with ioflood (operate own network in PhoenixNAP)


**NETHERLANDS**

**------EUVPS128------**

**2** Cores - Equal Share
**128**MB RAM
**128**MB SWAP
**6**GB Raid 10 HDD Space
**300** GB Transfer 
**1** x IP4
**5** x IP6

PRICE €20 p/year ($24.64)

Order Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=48
PROMO CODE: SALEAUG2012NL128

------------------------
